item.title: A New Blog
item.description: Matplotblog, the new blog of matplotlib, to showcase and share great visualization stories.

item.title: Elliott Sales de Andrade hired as Matplotlib Software Research Engineering Fellow
item.description: We have hired Elliott Sales de Andrade as the Matplotlib Software Research Engineering Fellow supported by the Chan Zuckerberg Initiative Essential Open Source Software for Science
